sentences.english: Also increased the special effect of anthocyanins with skincare.

sentences.english: The activity is healthy, environment friendly, and worth spreading. O yeah.

sentences.english: Aloe extract hydrates, beautifies, whitens and softens skin.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of anti-aging effect of Yangyan Quban particles on the aging skin.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內服養顏祛斑顆粒抗皮膚衰老作用及機制。
